variations.description: Generates 1 Order Energy, heals all allies for 120% of Czerni's ATK, and increases Magic DMG taken by enemies by 18%.
Generates 1 Order Energy, heals all allies for 140% of Czerni's ATK, and increases Magic DMG taken by enemies by 21%.
Generates 1 Order Energy, heals all allies for 160% of Czerni's ATK, and increases Magic DMG taken by enemies by 24%.
Generates 1 Order Energy, heals all allies for 180% of Czerni's ATK, and increases Magic DMG taken by enemies by 27%.
Generates 1 Order Energy, heals all allies for 200% of Czerni's ATK, and increases Magic DMG taken by enemies by 30%.
Draws a card from the deck. A healing card heals all allies for 270% of Czerni's ATK and a damage card deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies.
Draws a card from the deck. A healing card heals all allies for 315% of Czerni's ATK and a damage card deals Magic DMG equal to 315% of ATK to all enemies.
Draws a card from the deck. A healing card heals all allies for 360% of Czerni's ATK and a damage card deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies.
Draws a card from the deck. A healing card heals all allies for 405% of Czerni's ATK and a damage card deals Magic DMG equal to 405% of ATK to all enemies.
Draws a card from the deck. A healing card heals all allies for 450% of Czerni's ATK and a damage card deals Magic DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies.
Has a 20% chance to restore 1 Chaos Energy.
Has a 40% chance to restore 1 Chaos Energy.
